casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Leeth.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Leeth (1989), 42 Ohio St. 3d 97.]

(No. D.D. 88-32 Submitted February 14, 1989 Decided April 26, 1989.) *98J. Warren Bettis, disciplinary counsel, and Carl J. Corletzi, for relator. Theodore T. Ivanchak, for respondent. Per Curiam.

We concur with the board’s findings and its recommendations. Accordingly, respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to the respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
